segments.text: How high was your temperature yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't take my temperature but I felt feverish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you open your mouth ? Your throat is swollen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Doctor , I can't eat any foods because I had a sore throat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You seem to have a cold . I'll give your an injection and let me write down your prescription .
segments.speaker: S1
